comment.text: This translation key is used for a label in a settings dialog that displays the phrase "New secret key" to help users understand what they are creating or editing. The text appears in a dialog window where users can create or edit API keys, and it serves as a descriptive title or placeholder text.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'Yeni' is correct for 'New', 'gizli açar' is not the most natural or accurate translation for 'secret key'. 'gizli açar' literally translates to 'hidden key'. A more accurate and common translation would be 'sirrli açar' or 'gizli açar sözü'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Yeni sirrli açar or Yeni gizli açar sözü

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'secret' is directly transliterated instead of being translated to Finnish. A more appropriate translation would be 'salainen'.

The Armenian translation 'Նար գաղտնի բանալի' doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'New secret key'. 'Նար' (Nar) means 'I am' or 'me', which is irrelevant here. It should convey the idea of 'new' relating to a secret key.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Մեկ գաղտնի բանալի (Mek gaztní banalí) - 'One secret key' or Նոր գաղտնի բանալի (Nor gaztní banalí) - 'New secret key'

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Lao translation 'ຄີລັບໃໝ່' is a literal translation of 'secret key'. While understandable, it might not be the most natural or idiomatic way to express 'new secret key' in Lao, depending on the context. A more appropriate translation might convey the sense of a newly generated or assigned secret key. 'ສາໍານານຸກຸນໃໝ່' (sarnanukun mai) might be more suitable.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider 'ສາໍານານຸກຸນໃໝ່' (sarnanukun mai) or a similar phrase that emphasizes the 'newly generated' aspect, or clarify the context to determine the best fit.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation 'Нови тајни кључ' translates literally as 'New secret keys' instead of 'New secret key'. The English content is singular, so the Serbian translation should reflect this.
